anime.description: This short-form horror series uses the classic "paper drama" storytelling style to present some of Japan`s most bizarre urban legends in a modern anime format. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お届け物
Delivery
Otodokemono
episode.summary: Katagiri is housesitting for his friend, who`s traveling and needs someone to be there to accept an important package he`s expecting. The delivery finally arrives late that evening, but his friend says he`s expecting another package the next day and asks him to stay one more night. Katagiri begins to wonder what is in these packages that`s so important... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 眠れない子供
The Sleepless Child
Nemurenai Kodomo
episode.summary: Sawako and her young son wait alone at their home in the suburbs for her husband to come home. As the night drags on, Sawako`s uneasy feeling begins to turn into fear... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 応接間
The Reception Room
Ousetsuma
episode.summary: The expedition crew finally make their way inside of Banagawa castle, where they confront the tyrannical machine shogun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絵画
Paintings
Kaiga
episode.summary: A certain young man visits an art exhibit after receiving a free entry ticket. The lady at the reception desk seems creepy enough, but all the paintings in this bizarre exhibit are like nothing he`s seen before. When the young man does something he was advised not to do, an unexpected fate awaits him... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終了のお知らせ
Notice of Termination of Service
Shuuryou no Oshirase
episode.summary: Hamano is visiting a certain small town on a business trip. On the way to his hotel, he passes by several funerals, which makes him wonder if the town suffered some sort of accident. That night, as he`s settling in at his hotel... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ベランダ
The Veranda
Veranda
episode.summary: Hamano is visiting a certain small town on a business trip. On the way to his hotel, he passes by several funerals, which makes him wonder if the town suffered some sort of accident. That night, as he`s settling in at his hotel... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 公衆電話
Public Phone
Koushuudenwa
episode.summary: Chie suddenly gets a call from her younger sister during work asking for her help. She heads toward the phone booth that her sister directed her to, but an unusual sight awaits her... What could have happened to Chie`s sister? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 咳
Cough
Seki
episode.summary: Takayuki lives in an old, wooden apartment building, where he spends every day in an ongoing quarrel with his elderly neighbor. One evening, he hears violent coughing through the thin wall, along with the pained voice of the old man... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エレベーターの女
The Woman in the Elevator
Elevator no Onna
episode.summary: The residents of a certain apartment complex are taking the elevator early one morning. The day starts out like any other, but is soon warped by terror... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漫画喫茶
Manga Cafe
Manga Kissa
episode.summary: Matsudera works at a certain manga café. One day, a guest asks if he has found a misplaced earring, and that`s where the terror begins... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妹の部屋
Little Sister`s Room
Imouto no Heya
episode.summary: Matsudera works at a certain manga café. One day, a guest asks if he has found a misplaced earring, and that`s where the terror begins... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 試着室
Fitting Room
Shichakushitsu
episode.summary: A certain office lady discovers a little boutique in town. She become excited by the nostalgic clothes inside and loses herself in her own memories. But when the truth is revealed, she also loses something else... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冷蔵庫
Refrigerator
Reizouko
episode.summary: The story of a close-knit family. The children look forward to their mother`s cooking, and the parents watch out for their children. They live a happy life... but that happiness begins to change. What will become of this family? Source: crunchyroll
